sentences.en: Main watercourses are the Xijiang River, Ping waterways, Mei Jiao River, South Shahe so.
sentences.cn: 主要水道有西江干流 、 平洲水道 、 眉焦河 、 南沙河等.

sentences.en: New York and Philadelphia, by contrast, served a rich and fertile hinterland laced with navigable watercourses.
sentences.cn: 相反, 纽约和费城则提供了富足肥沃并与通航的水路相连的腹地.

sentences.en: Regulate rivers and watercourses this ancient problem is becoming more complex and stem.
sentences.cn: 治水这一古老的问题正在变得更为复杂严峻.

sentences.en: The Superintendent of Public Works gives orders for all watercourses to be inspected.
sentences.cn: 公共建设部部长下令检查所有河道。

sentences.en: There are plains of hard sands and plateaus with dried - up watercourses, the there are mountain ranges.
sentences.cn: 这里有平坦的戈壁滩,有水道干涸了的高原, 还有连绵不断的山岭.

sentences.en: This often results in huge holes in the ground, noxious spoil-heaps and polluted watercourses.
sentences.cn: 这常常会在地面上留下一个个巨大的坑，有毒的矸子山和污染的河道.

trans.tran_cn: 水道，河道( watercourse的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: A watercourse is a stream or river, or the channel that it flows along
